we're talking about putting more web servers on when we're talking about scaling in iot we're talking about
the ability to go from a small number of devices to a large number of devices in a pocket in the office you might
actually manually copy a connection string onto a device but that's obviously not going to work when you're dealing rolling out
solutions that have thousands and thousands of devices um so scaling is by far the number one
reason that we've seen seeing things fail at poc beyond that we're seeing the business driven reasons
are the next most common reasons why things like projects don't proceed and often rit

um problems occurring so as we talked about on the previous slide scaling is the number one challenge
another challenge we see is that in a single organization there's often diverse devices and solution ecosystems

of organizations a lot of customers is they literally just don't have any developers so the business is out there and they
